page.notproperlyconfigured: Quick search is not properly configured. (Dynamic property "Global search page" must have been defined.)

search.nomatches: No matches found. Please try again.
search.help:
Search hints!
  • Enter up to 10 words separated with a space, for example word1 word2 word33
  • Restrict the search by placing a plus sign (+) in front of the words that must be found to consider the page a match, for example +word1 +word2 +word3
  • Restrict the search by placing a minus sign (-) in front of the words that must not occur to consider the page a match, for example +word1 +word2 -word3
  • If "Match whole word" is selected, but you still want to match part of a word, place an asterisk(*) at the end of the word, for example word1* word2 which will match pages with the words "word123" and "word2", but not "word123" and "word234".
search.indexservererror: The index engine is not running at the moment and searches against files and documents cannot be done.

login.persistentlogin: Enable automatic logon to this Web site

mobileinfo.maininfo:
How to enable WAP functions in EPiServer

Since the WAP/mobile device support in EPiServer is based on the Microsoft Mobile Internet Toolkit, it is not enabled by default. If you want to activate the mobile device support, follow the instructions below.

  • Download and install the Microsoft Mobile Internet Toolkit on your development machine. It can be downloaded from http://www.msdn.microsoft.com
  • Go to EPiServer's Admin mode and open the page type definition for Mobile page
    • Enter settings for this page type.
    • Change "File name" to point to templates/Mobile.aspx instead of templates/MobileInfo.aspx
    • Save changes.
  • Add a reference to System.Web.Mobile (installed with the Mobile Internet Toolkit) to your EPiServer development project.
  • Include the file /templates/Mobile.aspx in your EPiServer development project.
  • Recompile your EPiServer project.

pagetypes.common:
Default language The language that the page should use if there is no version of the selected language
Audio Format Choose format for audio. Choose 2 for mp3 and 3 for wav
Language for speaker's voice Choose language that the text will be read in
Fetch page with site map from Specify which page will be shown as site map in quick links
Fetch page with my settings from Specify which page will be shown as my settings in quick links
Use this page in portal Select this option, if you want the page to be displayed in portal status
Properties that portal visitors are to be allowed to change Select the options available for personalization on this portal
Search path to folder to be displayed Specify the address of the folder, the content of which is to be displayed in the list
Sort file list by Select how the list is to be sorted
First name Specify the first name for this profile
Last name Specify the last name for this profile ¨
E-mail address Specify the e-mail address for this profile
Company Specify the company name for this profile
User name Specify the user/login name to be linked to this profile
Profile Specify profile/competence for this profile
Title Specify the title for this profile
Department Specify the department for this profile
Image Specify the image to be displayed with this profile
Telephone Specify the telephone number to be displayed with this profile
Search path for external link Specify the URL for the Web site/page you want to link to. Include http://
Downloading presentations Select the page you want to download a presentation from
Show number of pages in presentation In whole numbers, specify how many pages are to be displayed in the presentation
Number of seconds each page is to be displayed In whole numbers, specify how many seconds each page is to be displayed in the presentation
Heading for RSS source Specify a heading to news in RSS format.
Search path to RSS source Specify the address to news in RSS format. This is usually an Internet address.
Show number of news items in RSS list In whole numbers, specify how many news items are to be displayed in the list
Only show news items in RSS list Selecting this option will only display RSS news headlines in the list
Exchange server Specify the name of the server on which Exchange is installed
User name Specify the user name for the Exchange folder to be displayed
Show Exchange view Specify the Exchange view to be displayed, e.g. inbox or calendar
Content in top left section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the top left section
Content in bottom left section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the bottom left section
Content in main section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the main section
Content in top right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the top right section
Content in centre right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the centre right section
Content in bottom right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the bottom right section
Content in main section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the main section
Content in top right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the top right section
Content in centre right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the centre right section
Content in bottom right section Specify the page to be displayed as standard in the bottom right section
Show number of news items in the list In whole numbers, specify how many news items are to be displayed
Download calendar events Specify the page you want to download calendar events from
Show number of calendar events in the list In whole numbers, specify how many events are to be displayed
Main image on start page Specify the image to be displayed on the start page
Main news Specify the main news for the start page
Image at top of website Specify the image to be displayed as the main image on the website
Name Name of region
Color Color of region
Refresh rate Specify how often this section of the portal is to be updated (minutes). Entering 0 means that the portal section will not be automatically reloaded and is standard
News list Specify the page you want to fetch the news listing from
Path to Flash movie Specify path to the Flash movie to be shown by clicking on the button and then select the file.
Height Height on the flash movie
Width Width on the flash movie
"Start publish date" relative to when the page has been created Set "Start publish date" relative to when the page has been created
"Stop publish date" relative to when the page has been created Set "Stop publish date" relative to when the page has been created
Editor Content of your page. Here you can enter text, insert images, documents, tables, etc.
Fetch listing from Specify the page you want to fetch the listing from
Display number of pages in the list Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing
Type of page in the listing Specify the page type that is to be shown in the listing
Display the following categories Specify the categories that are to be displayed on this page
Activate as subscription root Select this check box to allow visitors to subscribe to this page and its children.
Writer Name of the person who is responsible for the content
E-mail address of the recipient E-mail address of the person who will receive the information
Introduction Introductory text often shown in listings
Editor for users who are logged in Description of the choices a user can make when he or she is logged in
Scope for IndexServer search Specify the folder in which the search will take place. If you leave this field empty, the search will take place in the Upload folder
Catalog for the Index Server Specify the Index Server catalog to search
Display pages from Specify the page from which you want to display the recently changed pages
Display the pages that have been changed in the past x hours Specify how far back you want to display changed pages, using an integer for the number of hours
Display content from page Specify the page from which the index will start
Display the index with the number of levels down Specify an integer for the number of sub-levels to be displayed in the index
Number of columns for the index Specify an integer for the number of columns to be displayed in the index
E-mail sender E-mail address of the person who will receive the answers on the form
Form Specify the form that will be shown on this page. By clicking the button, you can create your own forms
Do not display this on the subscription page Specify if you want to show this page in the ordinary subscription page
Main page for news groups Specify the page that will be the main page for the news group
Page type for news items Specify the page type that will be used for news items
Allow news item Specify if you will allow news item on this page
E-mail address E-mail address of the person who created the news item
Belongs to the following news group Specify the news group that the news item will belong to
Display menus from Specify a place in the menu tree from where menus will be displayed on the selected page
Global search page Specify the page that will be the global search page for the Web site
Page description Describe the content of the page
Standard search words for pages Specify a comma-separated list of search words that match this page
Recurring activity Select this box if you want to create a recurring activity
Start date Specify the start date for the activity
Stop date Specify the stop date for the activity
Recurring day Specify if the activity is to recur at set intervals
Number of days to show in calendar Specify an integer for how many days you want to show in the calendar
Type of pages to show in calendar Specify which page type to use for calender event
Show calendar information from Specify a place in the menu tree from where calendar will be displayed
1. Heading
1. Fetch listing from Specify the page you want to fetch the listing from
1. Display number of pages in the list Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing
1. Sort order Defines the order in which children of this page will be displayed.
2. Heading
2. Fetch listing from Specify the page you want to fetch the listing from
2. Display number of pages in the list Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing
2. Sort order Defines the order in which children of this page will be displayed.
Subject in subscription e-mail This is the subject field in the subscription e-mail that will be sent to the subscribers.
Link text in the e-mail This text will build the link that the user will be able to click on in the subcription e-mail.
Introduction text in e-mail Enter the text that will be the message body above the list of modified pages sent in the subscription e-mail.
Subscription root Select a starting point for the subscription. A link to each page changed or added below this point in the tree will be sent in the subscription e-mail.
Start page for the search If this field is left empty, the search will start from the start page
List to the right Enter starting point for the help list to the right.
Show statistics on page template Show statistics on page for visitors.
Start page for the conference Specify which page is the first page in this forum (usually this page)
Search profiles from Specify a place in the menu tree where you want to make your profile search. Usually this page.
Hide username Do not allow the user to edit name
Hide description Do not allow the user to edit description
Hide first name Do not allow the user to edit first name
Hide last name Do not allow the user to edit last name
Hide e-mail Do not allow the user to edit e-mail
Hide company Do not allow the user to edit company
Hide title Do not allow the user to edit title
Hide address Do not allow the user to edit address
Hide postal number Do not allow the user to edit postal number
Hide telephone Do not allow the user to edit telephone
Hide mobile Do not allow the user to edit mobile
Hide language Do not allow the user to edit language
Hide password Do not allow the user to edit password
Hide postal address Do not allow the user to edit postal address
Type of page to display in profile finder Choose page type to use as personal page in profile finder
Path to document Path to a copy of the source document, this field will automatically be updated.
Path to HTML edition of document Path to the complete HTML edition of the source document. This field will automatically be updated.
External path to source document Complete path to the source document that was used to publish this page. This field will automatically be updated.
Upload complete HTML edition and copy of source document Select this option to be able to display the complete HTML edition
Allow page to be updated from document Select this option to be able to update this page from the source document
Display download link to source document Select this option to display a link to the source document
Path to document Path to the PDF file to display.
Information channel If selected, the WSRP portlet "Information Viewer" will make this tree branch selectable.
Form Specify the form that will be shown on this page. By clicking the button, you can create your own forms
Fetch template for workroom from Specify the page that you want to use as a template when creating workrooms.
Folder for document management Specify the search path to the folder where you want to store documents from the workroom.
Workroom is active Select this check box if you want the workroom to be active.
Fetch the bulletin board from Specify the page that you want to be the root page for the bulletin board.
Calendar is active Select this check box if you want the calendar to be active.
Bulletin board is active Select this check box if you want the bulletin board to be active.
Document management is active Select this check box if you want document management to be active.
News list is active Select this check box if you want the news list to be active.
Overview is active Select this check box if you want the overview to be active.
Information about member status Shows information about the status of different members.
Root folder for workroom Specify the folder where the workroom sub-folders are to be created.
Common portal data Information about common portal data.
Layout controls Layout controls, comma-separated.
Block subscription for this page Select this check box to block subscription updates for this page.
Form for blog posts Specify the form that will be used for blog posts on this page. By clicking the button, you can create your own forms.
Form for comments Specify the form that will be used for blog post comments on this page. By clicking the button, you can create your own forms.
Formatting for blog list Specify the format that will be used for the list of blog posts on this page.
